# Luke Stahl - Developer Marketer & Frontend Developer 

> Personal portfolio and professional website for Luke Stahl

## About

- Luke Stahl is a developer marketer and frontend developer who bridges the gap between marketing strategy and technical implementation. Currently at Webflow doing developer marketing. Before that: Builder.io, Pangea, Contentful, HERE Technologies. Started in healthcare marketing for 13 years before switching to tech in 2018.

## Site Structure

- [Home](https://lukestahl.io/)
- [About](https://lukestahl.io/about/)
- [For LLMs](https://lukestahl.io/for-llms/)
- [Projects/Builds](https://lukestahl.io/builds/)
- [Blog](https://lukestahl.io/blog/)
- [Gems](https://lukestahl.io/gems/)

- [Design System](https://lukestahl.io/design-system/)
- [SEO Performance Dashboard](https://lukestahl.io/seo/)
- [Status](https://lukestahl.io/status/)

## Professional Focus

- Developer Marketing
- Frontend Web Development
- Product Strategy
- Content Strategy
- Technical Writing

## Technical Skills

### Frontend
- React, Next.js, Astro, Vue, Swift, Tailwind CSS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript

### Backend
- Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, GraphQL, Contentful, APIs, Cloud Deployment, Edge Functions

### Tools
- Cursor, Claude Code, Figma, Webflow, Builder.io, Notion, GitHub, Vercel, PostHog, Supabase, Ahrefs, SurferSEO, ChatGPT, Gemini, FullStory, and more

### Marketing
- Product Marketing, Digital & Web Marketing, Content Strategy, Analytics, SEO, Paid Media, Social, Email, Community, Events, Project Management

## Education

- Certificate in Full Stack Web Development - Northwestern University
- MA in Communications - Southern New Hampshire University

## Featured Projects

- Budget Tracker App: Expense tracking app with React Native, Expo, Google OAuth, and Supabase sync
- SERP Tracker: Real-time search ranking tracker with React, TypeScript, and Chart.js
- Stahlwalker Cookbook: Full-stack recipe app with Next.js and Contentful CMS
- Family Gaming Hub: React/Vite app with Mac OS 9 inspired interface

## Speaking

- Conference speaker at Webflow Conf 2025 - "Webflow Cloud for Full-Stack Web Apps"

## Tech Stack

- This site is built with Astro and deployed on GitHub Pages. Analytics powered by PostHog.
